video.title: The Kennedys
video.synopsis: Twentieth-century America's most storied political family gets the epic treatment in this miniseries that spans three decades of Kennedy history.

episodes.synopsis: It is the eve of the 1960 presidential election, and John F. Kennedy is poised to become the youngest man ever elected to office.
episodes.title: A Father's Great Expectations

episodes.synopsis: As the 1960 presidential election comes down to the wire, Bobby Kennedy tells Joe Sr. he's leaving politics.
episodes.title: Shared Victories, Private Struggles

episodes.synopsis: When the Bay of Pigs invasion proves disastrous, JFK sends Jackie and the kids away, leaving him to face the consequences of his actions.
episodes.title: Failed Invasion, Failed Fidelity

episodes.synopsis: The Russians build a wall separating East and West Berlin, with disastrous consequences for East Berliners.
episodes.title: Broken Promises and Deadly Barriers

episodes.synopsis: When Joe Sr. suffers a stroke, resentment over a past affair builds up in Rose, who tries to be Joe's caretaker but is thwarted by his former lover.
episodes.title: Moral Issues and Inner Turmoil

episodes.synopsis: Jackie leaves JFK after one too many infidelities; with his marriage in shambles, Jack has to deal with the Cuban missile crisis.
episodes.title: On the Brink of War

episodes.synopsis: Jackie and JFK travel to Texas before beginning Jack's re-election campaign. Lee Harvey Oswald finalizes his assassination plan.
episodes.title: The Countdown to Tragedy

episodes.synopsis: As the nation prepares for JFK's burial, Bobby is debilitated by suspicions that his actions may have led to Jack's assassination.
episodes.title: The Aftermath: A Family's Curse of Misfortune and Heartbreak
